newsitem.title: UK: NWE jet fuel firm, Med avails still tight.
newsitem.headline: NWE jet fuel firm, Med avails still tight.

text.p: NWE jet was firm on Thursday as futures surged and premiums remained strong, traders said.
On the barges, premiums were assessed at Sept IPE +$21/+$22 per tonne, fob ARA.
On the cif cargo market, premiums also remained firm at Sept IPE +$27/+$28.
Traders said availability in the Med remained tight. A Libyan cargo traded at quotes fob Med +$8.0. -- London Newsroom, +44 171 542 7714.3
